name: Timberland Graceyn Waterproof Mid Lace Side Zip Boots - Women's
categories: Graceyn Waterproof Mid Lace Side Zip Boots
description:
Waterproof leather boots that pair vintage lines and modern construction. The Graceyn use sustainably minded materials that you can feel good about.Full-grain leather from a tannery rated Silver or higher by The Leather Working Group. Tanneries are assessed based on energy use, waste production and water treatment.Waterproof breathable membrane.Side zips.Moisture-wicking liners made from ReBOTL™ fabric.¾ length, leather lined OrthoLite® footbed.Ergonomic MirrorFit™ system follows the contours of your feet.Grippy rubber tread.Timberland’s ReBOTL material contains at least 50% recycled plastic, mainly from plastic bottles. To date Timberland has helped more than 445 metric tons of plastic waste find new life in their products.

        Sustainability









                      Leather Working Group leather
